name: .XSX
summary: Learn about .XSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Because Visual Studio automatically generates and maintains XSX files, you likely will not need to open an XSX file. However, you can open an XSX file in Microsoft Visual Studio by following these steps:
From the Visual Studio menu bar, select File → Open → File....
Navigate to the folder containing your XSX file.
Select your XSX file and click Open.
You can also open an XSX file using any XML editor, such as SyncRO Soft oXygen XML Editor.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .xsx file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: XSX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
